page.title: 04SURVEY OF CHILDREN'S HOMES
page.content: Of a total of approx 260 children interviewed 4 live in a bungalow. 8 live in a flat. 99 live in a detached house. 90 live in a semi-detached house 4 live in a public houses 5 live on a farm. 19 children had 2 bedrooms. l00 children had 3 bedrooms. 67 children had 4 bedrooms. l7 had more than 4 bedrooms. 49 have more than one bathroom. l69 have a proper garage not a carport 174 had walls of brick. l6 had walls of stone. 37 had walls of a mixture. 24 had houses with roofs of slate. 2l2 had houses with roofs of tiles.
